topics.content_en: Integers include positive numbers, negative numbers, and zero: {..., -3, -2, -1, 0, 1, 2, 3, ...}. On a number line, positive integers are to the right and negative integers are to the left. Rules for addition: positive + positive = positive; negative + negative = negative; positive + negative = subtract and keep sign of larger number. Subtraction: a - b = a + (-b). Example: 5 - (-3) = 5 + 3 = 8.

Rules for multiplication and division of integers: positive × positive = positive; negative × negative = positive; positive × negative = negative. Examples: (-3) × (-4) = 12; (-3) × 4 = -12; 12 ÷ (-4) = -3; (-12) ÷ (-4) = 3. The product of an even number of negative integers is positive; odd number of negatives gives a negative product.
topics.content_ml: ഗുണന-ഹരണ നിയമങ്ങൾ: ഋണ × ഋണ = ധനം; ധനം × ഋണ = ഋണം. (-3) × (-4) = 12. ഇരട്ട ഋണ = ധനം.

topics.content_en: A fraction represents part of a whole. To add/subtract fractions: make denominators equal first. To multiply fractions: multiply numerators together and denominators together. Example: (2/3) × (3/4) = 6/12 = 1/2. To divide fractions: multiply by the reciprocal. Example: (2/3) ÷ (4/5) = (2/3) × (5/4) = 10/12 = 5/6. Mixed fractions can be converted to improper fractions for calculations.
topics.content_ml: ഭിന്ന സംഖ്യ ഒരു മുഴുവന്റെ ഭാഗം. കൂട്ടലിന് ഹരം ഒരുപോലെ ആക്കണം. ഗുണനം: ലവം × ലവം, ഹരം × ഹരം. (2/3) × (3/4) = 1/2.

topics.content_en: A linear equation has one variable raised to power 1. To solve: perform the same operation on both sides to isolate the variable. Example: 2x + 3 = 11 → 2x = 8 → x = 4. Word problems: 'A number increased by 5 gives 12. Find the number.' Let the number = n, then n + 5 = 12, so n = 7. Transposing: moving a term to the other side changes its sign.
topics.content_ml: ഏകഘാത സമവാക്യം ഒരു ചരം ഉള്ള സമവാക്യം. 2x + 3 = 11 → x = 4. ഒരു ഭാഗത്തുനിന്ന് മറുഭാഗത്തേക്ക് കൊണ്ടുപോകുമ്പോൾ ചിഹ്നം മാറും.

topics.content_en: Perimeter is the total length of the boundary of a shape. Area is the amount of surface enclosed. Rectangle: Perimeter = 2(l + b); Area = l × b. Square: Perimeter = 4a; Area = a². Triangle: Area = (1/2) × base × height. Parallelogram: Area = base × height. Rhombus: Area = (1/2) × d1 × d2 where d1 and d2 are diagonals. The unit of area is square metres (m²).
topics.content_ml: ചുറ്റളവ് — ഒരു ആകൃതിയുടെ അതിർത്തിയുടെ ആകെ നീളം. വിസ്തൃതി — ഉൾക്കൊള്ളുന്ന ഉപരിതലം. ചതുരം: l × b. ത്രികോണം: (1/2) × അടിത്തടം × ഉയരം.
